item.title: XP rate
item.dc:creator: @wat72 wat72
item.description:
@wat72 wrote:

[quote=“chrisrocks4122, post:4, topic:255330”]go to your client file first find out what the exp rate per hit is then try to find something that looks like this in the client.java

      if (UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing) {
        TotalExp = (double)(1200*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
      } else if (FightType != 3) {
        TotalExp = (double)(400*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
      } else {

my exp rate is 400 thats where you change the exp rate:)[/quote]Wrong section you retard, this is RSC not RS2.

go to your client file first find out what the exp rate per hit is then try to find something that looks like this in the client.java

      if (UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing) {
        TotalExp = (double)(1200*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
      } else if (FightType != 3) {
        TotalExp = (double)(400*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
      } else {

my exp rate is 400 thats where you change the exp rate:)
